page.title: 15A SCHOOLBOY'S SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday I got up at nine o'clock to watch television and then went out to play small ball. After this I was given my pocket money (80 pence) and bought water bombs to throw at my brother. I went round to my friend's to play football, and was the first to score ten, so I won as usual. At three thirty I went swimming, having had a dinner of fish and chips. Richard came with me to swim. After swimming I again played football, with me and my brother against my friend and his father. I spent the evening watching television and then went to bed upstairs after having a read.
